dcterms:creator: 3GPP
dcterms:description: This dataset provides the modulation and coding schemes (MCS) used in 5G NR systems, which are essential for optimizing spectral efficiency and maintaining low block error rates.
dcterms:title: 5G NR Modulation and Coding Scheme (MCS)

dcterms:creator: A. Zaidi
F. Athley
J. Medbo
U. Gustavsson
G. Durisi
X. Chen
dcterms:description: This dataset contains the Urban Macro (UMa) NLOS path loss model, which is used to evaluate the performance of wireless communication systems in urban environments without line of sight.
dcterms:title: Urban Macro (UMa) NLOS Path Loss Model

dcterms:creator: R. Bruno
A. Masaracchia
A. Passarella
dcterms:description: This dataset includes Block Error Rate (BLER) curves for mapping Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR) to Channel Quality Indicator (CQI), which are crucial for adaptive modulation and coding in LTE systems.
dcterms:title: BLER Curves for SNR to CQI Mapping
